generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks running down the center, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and trees, and are designated for pedestrians.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage line both sides of the street, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing as a bright, open area.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street and some are in motion on the road.
- train: Tram tracks are visible running down the center of the road, indicating the presence of a train (tram) system.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible along the road, including a triangular warning sign and other signs mounted on poles.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
